ARABIC: أَفَسِحْرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمْ أَنتُمْ لَا تُبْصِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So is this magic? Or is it that you do not see?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Is it magic, or you cannot see?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Is this, then, any feat of magic or are you unable to see?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Is it magic or do you not still see?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “So is this magic, or are you unable to see?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Is this magic or do you not see
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Is it magic then or do you not see?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What, is this magic, or is it you that do not see?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Is this magic, or do ye not see?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Is this magic or do you not see?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Is this magic? or ye still see not clearly!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Is this, then, [also] magic, or is it you who do not perceive?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Is this then a fake, or is it ye that do not see?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Is this magic, or do you not see?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Is this magic, or is it that you do you not see?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Is this magic, or do you not see?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then is this magic, or do you not see?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:15] Is this then sorcery, [this] chastisement that you see — as you were wont to say about the revelation, that it was sorcery — or is it that you do not see?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Is this magic) is this Day and its torment magic, since you said in the life of the world to the messengers that they were wizards, (or do ye not see) or do you not perceive?
